excerpt.rendered: We strive to provide the best service to international students, skilled immigrants, and our institutional clients. Read what they’re saying.

acf.intro_text: We strive to provide the best service to international students, skilled immigrants, and our institutional clients. Read what they’re saying.
acf.main_content_item_1_text:
“I’ve used WES several times and they have always been a fast and diligent service. I’d recommend it to anyone who needs their transcripts converted.”
—Rebecca Krygiel

“I used WES to get a job with the City of New York. The process was relatively quick and easy. I particularly like the fact that you can re-order an evaluation at any time after the original evaluation is completed.”
—Kevon Gittens

“I had a great experience. My degrees were evaluated quickly and were delivered to the respective universities. Very satisfied!!!”
—Siddharth Srinivasan
acf.main_content_item_2_text: International student Omanjana Goswami discusses how WES credential evaluations, tools, and resources help international students achieve their goals.
acf.main_content_item_3_text: Architect and urban development specialist Kunle Ifesanya discusses how WES credential evaluations, tools, and resources helped him achieve his professional goals in the U.S.
acf.main_content_item_4_text:
“Given the high volume of applications we receive from international students, the use of WES services allows our admissions office to review applications more efficiently and know that the information we review is accurate and detailed.”
—Sarah Russell, Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University

“I attended a WES online training and I really appreciate the support your company is providing to higher education institutions. I don’t know what we would do without you! I appreciate your assistance so much.”
—Janel Dumbre, University of Houston-Clear Lake

“It is such a relief to know that our students get such an awesome service when they go through WES.”
—Amir Maleki, South Dakota State University
